Actions.Name: Holy
Actions.Effects: Foes inside are branded. Branded foes must save or become pacified.

Actions.Name: Redempta
Actions.Description: Target defeated ally in range 4 and remove incapacitated. They stop being defeated and return with 50% hp. They can act normally and take a turn starting next round.

Actions.Name: Shield of Faith
Actions.Description: Allied character in range 3 becomes marked, and gains sturdy and resistance while marked.
